segments.text: I watch the woman in the kitchen, so calmly drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, causing the sink to overflow steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot in the growing puddle on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if she slips on that wet surface? It terrifies me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching high into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance is off; the stool tilts, and I hold my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him looks up expectantly, adding to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could land in the water and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window reveals a peaceful garden, oblivious to the indoor peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel my heart racing just observing this risky scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make the climb even more hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for the whole family.
segments.speaker: PAR
